name: Lub Dub
description:
Lub Dub, a challenging 8-bit platformer with awesome game play. Rescue your one true love, who's been kidnapped by an evil witch, as you make your way through a perplexing maze riddled with booby traps , killer spikes, enchanted turrets and much more! Yes! This game was designed to hurt but fret not, for you have powerful abilities to ward off any threats and the heartbeat of the princess to serve as your beacon through the labyrinth. Follow the heartbeat and save the princess! What's next? New worlds with more awesomeness

- Interactive objects!
- 30 Exciting levels!
- Boss level!
- Three awesome power-ups!
Slow motion!
Invincible
Adrenaline rush!
